Default
Format:%d.%m.%Y
Position
Length
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 30 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 70 wsizex = textsize[0] + 120 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (800 > wsizex): wsizex = 800 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 64) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

{"templates": {"default": (100,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 12), size = (100, 75), png = 4), # index 4 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 10), size = (630, 25), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 1 is the Title MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 40), size = (370, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 5, color=0xF2F2F2, color_sel=0xF2F2F2), # index 5 is the Published Date MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 70), size = (370, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 6, color=0xF2F2F2, color_sel=0xF2F2F2), # index 6 is the Views Count MultiContentEntryText(pos = (490, 40), size = (255, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 7, color=0xF2F2F2, color_sel=0xF2F2F2), # index 7 is the duration MultiContentEntryText(pos = (490, 70), size = (255, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 8, color=0xF2F2F2, color_sel=0xF2F2F2), # index 8 is the ratingcount ]), "state": (100,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 10), size = (735, 28), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 40), size = (735, 50), font=3, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP, text = 1, color=0xF2F2F2, color_sel=0xF2F2F2), # index 2 is the description ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 18),gFont("Regular", 26),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 100 }

{"template": [MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (5, 0), size = (48, 48), png = 0),MultiContentEntryText(pos = (65, 10), size = (425, 38), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1),],"fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22)],"itemHeight": 48}
\n# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets.\nfrom enigma import eSize, ePoint\n\norgwidth = self.instance.size().width()\norgheight = self.instance.size().height()\norgpos = self.instance.position()\ntextsize = self["message"].getSize()\n\n# y size still must be fixed in font stuff...\nif self["message"].getText() != "":textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 60)\nelse:textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 4)\n\ncount = len(self.list)\nif count > 7:count = 7\noffset = 48 * count\nwsizex = textsize[0] + 80\nwsizey = textsize[1] + offset + 30\n\nif (460 > wsizex):wsizex = 460\nwsize = (wsizex, wsizey)\n\n# resize\nself.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))\n\n# resize label\nself["message"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))\n\n# move list\nlistsize = (wsizex - 30, 48 * count)\nself["menu"].downstream_elements.downstream_elements.instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1] + 10))\nself["menu"].downstream_elements.downstream_elements.instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))\n\n# center window\nnewwidth = wsize[0]\nnewheight = wsize[1]\nself.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - newheight)/2))
